argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | isclm.f | |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 2 |  | isclm.k | |- K = ( Base ` F ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_isclm | |- ( W e. CMod <-> ( W e. LMod /\ F = ( CCfld |`s K ) /\ K e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_simp2bi | |- ( W e. CMod -> F = ( CCfld |`s K ) ) |
